meanings.definition: Lacking a moral sense; unconcerned with the rightness or wrongness of something.
meanings.sent1: The robot made an amoral decision based on logic alone.
meanings.sent2: The scientist approached the experiment from an amoral perspective.
meanings.sent3: The cat's amoral behavior of knocking over the vase amused the family.
meanings.sent4: In the wild, nature can seem amoral, with survival being the only concern.
meanings.sent5: The character in the story was portrayed as amoral, only focused on personal gain.
